dict.string:
fkit="/Developer/ADC Reference Library/documentation/Cocoa/Reference/Foundation/ObjC_classic/Classes/${TM_CURRENT_WORD}.html" appkit="/Developer/ADC Reference Library/documentation/Cocoa/Reference/ApplicationKit/ObjC_classic/Classes/${TM_CURRENT_WORD}.html"
if [[ -f $fkit ]]; then exit_show_html '<meta http-equiv="Refresh" content="0;URL=tm-file://'${fkit// /%20}'">' elif [[ -f $appkit ]]; then exit_show_html '<meta http-equiv="Refresh" content="0;URL=tm-file://'${appkit// /%20}'">' else echo "Class: $TM_CURRENT_WORD not found!" fi
